text: Then nothing happened for a while. Our vacation duration was coming to a close. Checked everything off the list, and then some. I finished the mystery novel. It was, after all, the bell hop. Wonderment, regarding the valentine mob,

Bubbles gave us each a special phone if we ever needed to connect. So we did. We called Lucille a ball, voice mail. We decided against leaving a message. A few moments later, my friend's phone buzzed. Everything okay? Asked Chaplin Purple Heart? Yeah, I said my friend. Okay. We're gathering you up tonight. Be ready.
My friend and I, hiding our excitement, said, okay. Great then. Said Chaplin Purple Heart. Ciao.
